name: CI tests

on:
  push:
    branches: [ develop ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ develop ]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Debug env
        run: printenv | sort

      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      - name: Create .env file from secret
        run: |
          mkdir -p .  # optional, ensure folder exists
          echo "${{ secrets.ENV_FILE_CONTENTS }}" > .env


      - name: Build and start Docker Compose services
        working-directory: ${{ github.workspace }}
        run: |
          docker compose up -d --build
          echo "Waiting for services to start..."
          sleep 10

      - name: Test MQTT bridge
        run: docker compose run --rm -e CI=true mqtt-bridge python bridge.py

      - name: Test MQTT publish
        run: docker compose run --rm -e CI=true mqtt-publish python publish.py

      - name: Stop Docker Compose services
        if: always()
        run: docker compose down
